GSD.description:
usbnet: Fix linkwatch use-after-free on disconnect

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit 135199a2edd459d2b123144efcd7f9bcd95128e4. For more details please see the references link.
